summary: netfilter: ctnetlink: fix compilation warning after data race fixes in ct mark
details:
netfilter: ctnetlink: fix compilation warning after data race fixes in ct mark

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.83 by commit f8b29656013cbbd2e27341f39a7e58d16695b393, it was introduced in version v5.15.81 by commit 60387731e69f3fdf1021aa5ffe2c95ec12072c91. For more details please see the references link.
